```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(sp)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(leaflet)
library(DT)
library(dplyr)
```

### Mapa Interactivo

```{r echo=FALSE}
ub_argentina<-"C:/Users/damia/Documents/my web project/flex_dashboard project/flex_dashboard project/gadm36_ARG_2_sp.rds"
argentina<-readRDS(ub_argentina)
salta<-argentina[argentina$NAME_1=="Salta",]
contagios<-read.csv2('C:/Users/damia/Documents/my web project/flex_dashboard project/flex_dashboard project/contagios covid salta.csv',header = T)[1:23,3]
salta@data<-data.frame(contagios)
#spplot(salta,col.regions=hcl.colors(47,palette = 'harmonic',rev = T))
x<-colorNumeric('Reds',NULL)
leaflet(salta, options =
               leafletOptions(attributionControl = FALSE, minzoom=1.5)) %>%
  addPolygons(
    label=~salta$contagios,
    weight=1,color='#333333', opacity=1,
    fillColor = ~x(contagios), fillOpacity = 1,
    highlightOptions = highlightOptions(
      color='#000000', weight = 2,
      bringToFront = TRUE, sendToBack = TRUE)
    )%>%
  addLegend(
    "topright", pal =x, values = ~contagios,
    title = c('casos de Covid-19<br/>provincia de Salta'),
    opacity = 1 )
```
